name: Roadlike
description:
Ride your CHOSEN WAY, with Roadlike  from Keydrop Corporation!

Tired of racing down the same old road?

Wish your car was faster, better, and cooler than the rest? 

The true open-road experience comes screaming onto your personal computer with the mind-blowing revolution in track design. Sit down, buckle up, and get ready for the ride of a lifetime. All that's missing is the wind in your hair!

Featuring:

• 5 unique Biomes inspired by real-world locations

• 3 unbelievable upgrades that will put you ahead of pack

• 9 outrageous tracks that will have you reaching for your wallet to purchase the FREE soundtrack (available at https://tommis.bandcamp.com/album/roadlike-original-soundtrack and select retailers)

No ride is ever the same!

Rookie driver? No worries!

↑/W  - Accelerate

←/→ A/D - Steering

Space - Drift

↓/S - Reverse

Esc - Pause

Testimonials

If you're thinking of snoozing on Keydrop's high-octane racing adventure Roadlike like a square then these testimonials from our happy customers might have you pulling a proverbial 180 on the freeway!

I can't believe it! I've been playing this game for weeks now, and I've never seen the same road twice! How many roads did those Keydrop folks put into this amazing piece of software?

Frank d'Argent, Quebec City, Canada

It's such a fun to play the game with the car. Zoom! Zoom!  

Wilma Winkleshire, Cottingley, UK

Having the liberty of driving 400 kilometers per hour in the comfort of my own home really helped me cut down on those pesky speeding fines. Wonderful!

Billy O'reilly, Cork, Ireland
